pageContext.claim: “Had the opposition party (no, not the Media) won the election, the Stock Market would be down at least 10,000 points by now. We are heading up, up, up!”
pageContext.analysis: There is no indication that a victory by Hillary Clinton would have led to a 10,000-point decline in the Dow Jones Industrial Average. The stock market had already been in a lengthy bull market when Trump took office, buoyed by a growing economy under Barack Obama.
